recipe.name: (EXAMPLE) Garlic butter air fryer salmon
recipe.body:
Cut the fresh salmon into tiny fillets.
In a bowl, mix the butter, minced garlic, salt, pepper, and finally, some lemon juice that can be squeezed with a juicer or by hand.
Brush the mix over the salmon fillets, and put them in an air fryer for 8 to 10 minutes at 180 degrees celsius.

recipe.name: (EXAMPLE) Microwave scrambled eggs
recipe.body:
Whisk 2 eggs, milk, salt and pepper in a bowl and put it in the microwave in high power for 1 minute.
After it's set, stir again, and put the bowl back in the microwave for 30 seconds.
At the end, top with butter if desired.
